pullRequest.title: Motherlode mine sack ores overlay
pullRequest.bodyText: Originally wanted a way to see how much GP I'd earned in a given mlm session but didn't have time to figure out Java UI to add tooltips to the individual ImageComponents. The style is copied from the blast mine overlay, don't think anyone actually asked for this but I wanted it for myself, figured I'd put it up for a PR.

nodes.bodyText: Why is this added? It's not used...
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -460,6 +460,23 @@ public AsyncBufferedImage getImage(int itemId)
 	 * @param quantity
 	 * @return
 	 */
+	public AsyncBufferedImage getImage(int itemId, int quantity)

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		name = "Toggle item icons",
          
          
            
            		name = "Show ore icons",

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		description = "Shows the gems/ores as their items rather than text"

Change this and the keyName to showLootIcons() or something similar
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -123,4 +123,14 @@ default boolean showOresFound()
 	{
 		return true;
 	}
+
+	@ConfigItem(
+		keyName = "showLootAsItems",
+		name = "Toggle item icons",
+		description = "Shows the gems/ores as their items rather than text"
+	)
+	default boolean showLootAsItems()

nodes.bodyText: This doesn't need to be changed.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -65,60 +71,68 @@ public Dimension render(Graphics2D graphics)
 		int runiteFound = session.getRuniteFound();
 
 		// If no ores have even been collected, don't bother showing anything
-		if (nuggetsFound == 0 && coalFound == 0 && goldFound == 0 && mithrilFound == 0
-			&& adamantiteFound == 0 && runiteFound == 0)
+		// This will statement is true iff all ore counts are 0
+		if ((nuggetsFound | coalFound | goldFound | mithrilFound | adamantiteFound | runiteFound) == 0)

nodes.bodyText: This should only display collected ores, and not add images for ores which have 0 quantity.

commit.message: motherlode: Add option to show collected ore/gem icons
